name: Dice - A Brain Teaser
description:
Use the Arrow Keys to rotate the dice around. Think 3-dimensional to build up a streak!

3D Dice Model: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/tools/dice-d6-game-ready-pbr-2001...

Applause sound by kalinkamalinka, 2014, licensed under CC-BY from https://freesound.org/people/kalinkamalinka/sounds/241903/
